dataQueryAql: select Participant.ppid, SpecimenCollectionGroup.name, Specimen.label, Specimen.createdOn where Specimen.collectionStatus = "Collected" and date_range(Specimen.createdOn, last_cal_month)

visits.aql: select count(SpecimenCollectionGroup.id) where SpecimenCollectionGroup.collectionStatus = "Complete" and date_range(SpecimenCollectionGroup.collectionDate, last_cal_month)

primarySpmns.aql: select count(Specimen.id) where Specimen.lineage = "New" and Specimen.collectionStatus = "Collected" and date_range(Specimen.createdOn, last_cal_month)

totalPrimarySpmns.aql: select count(Specimen.id) where Specimen.lineage = "New" and Specimen.collectionStatus = "Collected"

aliquots.aql: select count(Specimen.id) where Specimen.lineage = "Aliquot" and Specimen.collectionStatus = "Collected" and date_range(Specimen.createdOn, last_cal_month)

totalAliquots.aql: select count(Specimen.id) where Specimen.lineage = "Aliquot" and Specimen.collectionStatus = "Collected"

distributedSpmns.aql: select count(Order.orderItems.specimen.label) where date_range(Order.requestedDate, last_cal_month) and Order.orderStatus = "EXECUTED" and Order.orderItems.status in ("DISTRIBUTED", "DISTRIBUTED_AND_CLOSED")

totalDistributedSpmns.aql: select count(Order.orderItems.specimen.label) where Order.orderStatus = "EXECUTED" and Order.orderItems.status in ("DISTRIBUTED", "DISTRIBUTED_AND_CLOSED")

top5Spmns.aql: select Specimen.type as "Specimen Type", count(Specimen.id) as "Specimens" where Specimen.lineage = "Aliquot" and Specimen.collectionStatus = "Collected" and Specimen.availableQty > 0 order by count(Specimen.id) desc limit 0, 5
